channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260108.6)
item.description:
What's New

refactor: improve overlay app detection accuracy

  • Remove window owner detection method from OverlayAppDetector

* Window owner detection is unreliable when app process runs in background

* Only keep AX attributes detection (more accurate, only detects when focused)

  • Fix overlay fallback logic in AppBehaviorDetector

* Unknown overlay names now fall through to bundle ID check

* Previously defaulted all unknown overlays to .spotlight behavior

  • Bump build version to 20260108.5

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
